title: Child rapist who got girl, 11, pregnant moans he won't be able to shop in jail
text:
Robert Cronin raped an 11 year-old child then got her pregnant – but has now moaned to Schenectady Superior Court that he won’t be able to go shopping in malls during his 24 year prison sentence (Pictures: Schenectady County Jail/Google)

A child rapist who got an 11 year-old pregnant moaned that he will miss going to shopping malls during his 24 year jail sentence.

Robert Cronin, 34, made the bizarre complaint after being told he will spend almost a quarter of a century behind bars on Thursday.

Cronin, of Niskayuna in upstate New York, whinged even after the court heard harrowing testimony from his young victim, who has since given birth to his child.

He sat emotionless as the girl told how the pedophile had destroyed her innocence and changed her life forever.

And prosecutor Michael Nobles hit out at Cronin’s arrogance, saying: ‘An 11-year-old girl gave birth to a child because of his selfishness and he’s mad he can’t go to malls.’

Cronin admitted raping a child under the age of 13 in August, but offered a stomach-churning and unlikely excuse for his crime, News5 reported.

He told a reporter from News10 that his victim had only become pregnant after wearing an item of clothing that he’d previously used to masturbate.

Reporter Anya Tucker was immediately incredulous with Cronin’s excuse, asking the pervert: ‘Do you understand why it would be hard for people to understand the reasoning behind this conception that you’re offering?’

And even Cronin conceded his version of events was unlikely to be believed, answering Cronin’s question with ‘Yes.’

The computer worker’s crimes were exposed after a call to a child abuse hotline made in November 2018, around nine months after the rape took place.

Cronin was arrested and charged in January 2019.

His victim and her baby are now safe and being cared for, according to social services.
description: Robert Cronin refuses to accept that he has done anything wrong. His victim has since had her baby at the age of just 11 years old
